segments.text: Yes , I need some more cash for my visit in China . May I cash a traveler ’ s check here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . We would be happy to cash it for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was going to cash it at the hotel , but one of my friends said that banks always give better exchange rates .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , any bank will cash it at our present traveler's check buying rate , for which we ’ re somewhere cheaper than hotels because of the service charge . You see , hotels really aren ’ t in the money exchange business although they will cash traveler ’ s check for their guest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean there is really not that much of a difference .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , may I cash these three checks for 100 dollars each ? I think that will be enough .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I'll be happy to cash these for you . Would you please countersign them here ?
segments.speaker: S1
